entry.em: ..TORNADO WATCH 72 IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM CDT THIS MORNING

entry.data:
SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY BE SEVERE WITH DAMAGING WINDS, LARGE HAIL, AND TORNADOES
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY PRODUCE DAMAGING WINDS, LARGE HAIL, AND TORNADOES IN THE MORNING
BREEZY WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
TEMPERATURE FALLING INTO THE LOWER 60S IN THE AFTERNOON
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, BECOMING WEST 15 TO 25 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
MUCH COOLER WITH LOWS AROUND 40
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
BREEZY AND MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
WEST WINDS 15 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 40 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH IN THE EVENING

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
HIGHS AROUND 60

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
